title: Anyone else having issues connecting?
body: Was ina ranked match and I got disconnected. My internet is fine though. Now I can't log back in...

replies.body:
It looks like Comcast encountered some [service issues](http://forums.xfinity.com/t5/X1/TV-Service-Interruption-10-11-2016/td-p/2813767) for a few hours before it was resolved. 

Let me know if you're still having issues with this.
SAdly, I am. My ping is usually at 60, but all day is at have at 200. :(

Ouch, 200ms of latency is pretty rough!

Typically latency rises are caused by ISP routing changes that cause your connection to take a longer path to the server. Before we take an in-depth look at your route, I'd like you to ensure your local network settings are compatible with League by using our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps caused any change to your latency.

Hey Februarys, 

It seems that there may be some Comcast/ISP-related issues at this time. Can you provide more information about what ISP you're using and what geographical location you're in (ie. Northern California)?
Ya just redownloaded the game too. still doesnt log in... it just sits there saying loading...
i cant log in either, that like 10 mins ago,  i still cant log in after restart
